content.text:
# Karnataka State Film Award for Best Male Playback Singer

| former name =
| holder_label = Most recent winner
| holder = Aneesh Keshava Rao
| award1_winner = 27
| award2_type = First winner
| award2_winner = Puttur Narasimha Nayak
| award3_type = Last winner
| award3_winner =
| website =
| previous =
| next =
}}
Karnataka State Film Award for Best Male Playback Singer is a state film award of the Indian state of Karnataka given during the annual Karnataka State Film Awards. The award honours Kannada language films.
Superlative winners
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| S. P. Balasubrahmanyam || rowspan=2|3 awards
|-
| Rajesh Krishnan

|-
| C. Aswath
|-
| Ramesh Chandra
|}
